articles.author: Zack Whittaker, Amanda Silberling
articles.title: Exclusive: Event startup Partiful wasn't stripping GPS locations from user-uploaded photos - TechCrunch
articles.description: The event planning startup, which has raised over $27M from a16z and others, fixed the bug after TechCrunch found that Partiful was not removing granular location data from users' profile photos.
articles.content: Social event planning app Partiful, which calls itself Facebook events for hot people, has firmly replaced Facebook as the go-to platform for sending party invitations. But what Partiful also has in … [+4710 chars]

articles.author: Sarah Perez
articles.title: Google’s Gemini AI app could soon be getting a big makeover - TechCrunch
articles.description: The company is seemingly experimenting with a new user interface that would shift the app from having a chatbot-style look and feel to one offering a scrollable feed with suggested prompts accompanied by eye-catching photos.
articles.content: After the success of OpenAI’s video editing app Sora, now at the top of the U.S. App Store, Google may be looking to give its Gemini AI app a more visually focused revamp. The company is seemingly ex… [+1939 chars]
